about: This project is a browser extension experiment built with Vue. It allows it's users to customize their Whatsapp Web chat background with different images and animations

Wikipedia is an online encyclopedia maintained by a model of open collaboration. They provide free access to their data through the MediaWiki API. I used this project to communicate with and exhibit data from this API. I'm not this designs original creator, just used it as a model for this experience.
This is my virtual Business Card. I plan to improve it regularly for a cleaner code and visuals. I got design inspiration from Jonas Reymondin and Brittany Chang. Feel free to look around.
